column4: BRIEF-Intermedia appoints Microsoft senior executive as new sales leader
column5: * Intermedia appoints Microsoft senior executive as new sales leader

column4: Sony unveils new versions of PlayStation 4
column5: Sony Interactive Entertainment  a division of Sony Corp   unveiled on Wednesday two new versions of its PlayStation 4 Console in an effort to help Sony maintain its sales lead over Microsoft Corp  and Nintendo Co Ltd . | Video

column4: Intel to spin out security unit  sell stake in business to TPG
column5: Intel Corp said it would spin out its cyber security division  formerly known as McAfee  and sell a majority stake in it to investment firm TPG for $3.1 billion in cash.

column4: Intel to spin out security unit  sell stake in business to TPG
column5: Intel Corp  said it would spin out its cyber security division  formerly known as McAfee  and sell a majority stake in it to investment firm TPG for $3.1 billion in cash.

column4: UPDATE 3-Intel to spin out security unit  sell stake in business to TPG
column5: Sept 7 Intel Corp said it would spin out its cyber security division  formerly known as McAfee  and sell a majority stake in it to investment firm TPG for $3.1 billion in cash.
